item.title: 沙特政府寻求 100 亿美元的罕见贷款交易
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯正在商谈通过一项罕见的贷款交易筹集多达 100 亿美元的资金，这标志着沙特为王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼的多元化计划筹集资金的努力迈出了最新一步。【原文：Saudi Arabia is in talks to raise as much as $10 billion in a rare loan deal, marking the latest step in the kingdom’s efforts to line up financing for Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s diversification plan.】

item.title: 波兰因通胀前景疲软意外降息
item.description: 波兰中央银行出人意料地在今年第四次降低利率，这是一个信号，表明尽管该国采取了宽松的预算政策，但决策者预计价格压力仍将受到遏制。【原文：Poland’s central bank unexpectedly reduced interest rates for a fourth time this year in a signal that policymakers expect price pressure to remain contained despite the country’s accommodative budget policy.】

item.title: 法国政府表示有望实现 2025 年赤字目标
item.description: 即将卸任的法国财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）表示，法国正在实现削减赤字的目标，他相信各政党之间的争斗仍能达成 2026 年的预算。【原文：France’s outgoing finance minister, Roland Lescure, said the country is on course to meet its deficit reduction target and that he’s confident feuding political parties can still deliver a 2026 budget.】

item.title: TAP 首席执行官认为航空公司 "很快 "将加入大型航空集团
item.description: 葡萄牙 TAP 航空公司首席执行官路易斯-罗德里格斯（Luis Rodrigues）周三表示，随着葡萄牙政府出售该航空公司少数股权计划的推进，该公司 "很快 "就会成为一家大型航空集团的一部分。【原文：Portuguese airline TAP SA should be part of a major aviation group “soon,” Chief Executive Officer Luis Rodrigues said Wednesday as the state moves ahead with its plan to sell a minority stake in the carrier.】

item.title: 阿里-伊曼纽尔筹资 20 亿美元收购 Frieze 艺术博览会等活动
item.description: 好莱坞超级经纪人阿里-伊曼纽尔（Ari Emanuel）为他创立的新公司 Mari 筹集了超过 20 亿美元的资金，该公司正在收购 Frieze 艺术博览会和马德里网球公开赛等活动业务。【原文：Hollywood superagent Ari Emanuel raised more than $2 billion in equity for Mari, a new company he founded that’s acquiring events businesses such as the Frieze art fairs and the Madrid Open tennis tournament.】

item.title: 格陵兰总理请求欧盟帮助确保数字链接安全并阻止威胁
item.description: 格陵兰总理呼吁欧盟深化北极地区的互联互通合作，防止 "未经授权的各方 "破坏其数字基础设施。【原文：Greenland’s prime minister called on the European Union to deepen cooperation on connectivity in the Arctic territory to prevent “unauthorized parties” from disrupting its digital infrastructure.】

item.title: 阿波罗将把西班牙的潜在交易重点放在能源和数据中心上
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司正在西班牙重点寻找能源转型、数据中心和基础设施方面的潜在投资机会。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is focusing its search for potential investment opportunities in Spain on the energy transition, data centers and infrastructure.】

item.title: 需求疲软，白糖溢价徘徊在 2 月份低点附近
item.description: 白糖相对于原糖的溢价徘徊在 2 月份的低点，因为在全球供应预计将改善的情况下，巴基斯坦购买量的减少损害了需求。【原文：White sugar’s premium over the raw variety flirted with lows last seen in February as reduced buying by Pakistan hurts demand at a time when global supplies are forecast to improve.】

item.title: 阿根廷使出浑身解数捍卫脆弱的比索
item.description: 在耗尽数十亿美元的储备后，阿根廷政府开始发挥创意，希望在本月晚些时候举行的关键中期选举前捍卫比索。【原文：Having burned through billions of dollars in reserves, Argentina’s government is getting creative as it looks to defend the peso ahead of crucial midterm elections later this month.】

item.title: 通货膨胀加速，罗马尼亚中央银行维持利率不变
item.description: 罗马尼亚中央银行连续第九次会议保持基准利率稳定，将借贷成本维持在欧洲最高水平之一，因为最近的增税提高了通货膨胀率。【原文：Romania’s central bank held the benchmark rate steady for a ninth-straight meeting, keeping borrowing costs at one of the highest levels in Europe as a recent increase in taxes lifted inflation.】

item.title: 西班牙央行基金部门押注西班牙经济将持续保持优异表现
item.description: 西班牙顶级资产管理公司预计，受国内需求和旅游业的推动，西班牙经济将继续领先于欧洲其他国家。【原文：Spain’s top asset manager expects the country’s economy to continue outpacing peers in Europe, boosted by domestic demand and tourism.】

item.title: 泰国称柬埔寨的行动是和平的关键，而非特朗普的调停
item.description: 泰国总理阿努丁-乍威拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）驳斥了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）调解与柬埔寨达成和平协议的必要性，与美国总统为赢得诺贝尔和平奖所做的努力保持了距离。【原文：Thailand’s Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul dismissed the need for Donald Trump to mediate a peace deal with Cambodia, distancing himself from the US president’s efforts to win a Nobel Peace Prize.】

item.title: 杰富瑞在第一品牌倒闭中面临 1.61 亿美元的风险
item.description: Jefferies Financial Group Inc. 表示，该公司持有破产汽车零部件供应商 First Brands Group 的贸易应收账款和贷款的基金的风险敞口为 1.61 亿美元。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. said it has $161 million of exposure to funds that held trade receivables and loans of bankrupt auto-parts supplier First Brands Group.】

item.title: 拉丁美洲顶级水务公司首席执行官正在寻求交易
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大水务公司的负责人准备开始进行交易，因为这家新近私有化的巴西公司已经达到了国家规定的扩大服务的关键基准。【原文：The head of Latin America’s largest water utility in ready to start making deals now that the newly privatized Brazilian company has met a key benchmark for the expansion of services set by the state.】

item.title: 智利消费价格小幅上涨，市场期待新一轮降息
item.description: 由于智利央行警告通胀风险增加，智利上个月的消费者物价涨幅与预期一致，这增加了下一次降息多长时间到来的押注的不确定性。【原文：Chile’s consumer prices rose in line with estimates last month as the central bank warns of increased inflation risks, adding uncertainty to bets on how soon the next interest rate cut could come.】

item.title: 新兴市场 "地位对越南意味着什么？
item.description: 股票指数提供商富时罗素（FTSE Russell）确认了将越南从 "前沿 "市场升级为 "新兴 "市场的计划。【原文：Stock index provider FTSE Russell has confirmed plans to upgrade Vietnam from a “frontier” to an “emerging” market.】

item.title: 在加拿大石油收购战中，Cenovus 向 MEG 提出了更优惠的报价
item.description: 加拿大 Cenovus Energy Inc. 在 MEG 投资者投票前一天提高了对竞争对手 MEG Energy Corp. 的收购要约，表明两家公司最初的交易没有得到足够的股东支持。【原文：Canada’s Cenovus Energy Inc. increased its takeover bid for rival MEG Energy Corp. one day before MEG investors were due to vote, signaling that the companies’ original deal didn’t have enough shareholder support.】

item.title: 瑞士法郎对日元汇率一周连创新高并未吓倒多头
item.description: 本周，瑞士法郎对日元汇率每天都创下新高，但这并没有阻止交易商押注更多的涨幅。【原文：The Swiss franc has a hit a record every day this week against the yen, but that isn’t stopping traders from betting on more gains.】

item.title: 欧盟担心美国新提案可能破坏贸易协定
item.description: 欧盟成员国定于周三听取有关与美国进行贸易谈判的最新情况通报，布鲁塞尔方面担心有关关键问题的艰难谈判尚未结束。【原文：European Union member states are scheduled to be briefed Wednesday on the latest in trade discussions with the US, and there are concerns in Brussels that tough negotiations over key issues aren’t over.】

item.title: 被遗忘的备忘录股票 ETF 为散户复活
item.description: 打入 13 万亿美元的美国 ETF 市场并非易事。卷土重来？更难。但这并不妨碍 Roundhill Investments 重拾大流行病时代的特例--MEME ETF。【原文：Breaking into the $13 trillion US ETF market is tough. Staging a comeback? Even tougher. That’s not stopping Roundhill Investments as it revives a pandemic-era trope — the MEME ETF.】

item.title: 美国房贷活动再次下滑，住房需求迅速逆转
item.description: 购房或再融资抵押贷款申请量连续第二周下降，这标志着美国房地产市场复苏的希望迹象迅速逆转。【原文：Applications for mortgages to buy a home or refinance both fell for a second week, marking a swift reversal of what had been a hopeful sign of a revival in the US housing market.】

item.title: 美元走强，新兴资产下跌，利率成为关注焦点
item.description: 美元反弹后，风险偏好减弱，新兴市场资产下跌。投资者关注波兰和罗马尼亚将于周三晚些时候做出的利率决定。【原文：Emerging-market assets fell as risk appetite waned following a rebound in the dollar. Investors looked ahead to interest-rate decisions in Poland and Romania due later Wednesday.】

item.title: 富时罗素指数升级后，越南瞄准 MSCI 指数
item.description: 越南多年的资本改革帮助其赢得了富时罗素的新兴市场升级，但要获得摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：Vietnam’s years of capital reforms helped win an emerging-market upgrade from FTSE Russell, but securing MSCI Inc.’s more coveted designation may prove a tougher challenge.】

item.title: 法国资产攀升，交易商倒计时谈判最后期限
item.description: 在开始最后一天的组阁谈判之前，法国看守政府总理对财政预算持乐观态度，法国股市随之走高。【原文：French markets edged higher as the country’s caretaker prime minister struck a note of optimism on the budget before starting a final day of talks to form a government.】
